paper_abstract: The increasing interest in cross-lingual and multilingual information retrieval has posed a great challenge of designing accurate information retrieval systems for Asian languages such as Chinese, Thai and Japanese. Word segmentation is one of the most important pre-processes of Chinese information processing. This paper reviews some popular word segmentation algorithms. Based on an improved Converse Chinese dictionary and an optimized reverse maximum matching algorithm, a Chinese word segmentation system is proposed. Experiments are carried out to demonstrate the substantially ameliorated accuracy and speed of the system.
paper_title: Design of Chinese word segmentation system based on improved Chinese converse dictionary and reverse maximum matching algorithm
